attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and then went to go get ice cream from my fridge. When I opened my freezer I saw a truly terrifying sight. Looking up at me was Donald Trump but he looked like Voldemort in the 4th Harry Potter book you know when he looks like a sick baby. He looked up at me and said, â€œthank you for helping me defeat Sleepy Joe,â€ in a low, whiny voice. I donâ€™t know how he got into my freezer but he was definitely eating my ice cream too! I wish I could give this app 0 stars. I will not be voting for him in November either. He clearly does not care about anyone but himself. He ate my ice cream!!!!
